Despite living in the frozen tundra that is Boston, I can’t resist a cold dessert. Even on a 30-degree day with a windchill of -15, the thought of ice cream still sounds perfect. I know it’s a bit weird, but cold desserts just hit differently. Recently I heard about frozen hot chocolate, and decided to give it a try — and wow, it was a flavor explosion.

Almost every one of my taste buds was satisfied, and I knew I needed more. After some digging, I found out that the famous New York City dessert spot, Serendipity 3, sells its legendary frozen hot chocolate online. And guess what? It’s available on QVC! The Gourmet Frrrozen Hot Chocolate Mix is available in its original flavor. It’s rich, creamy, and totally irresistible. Whether you’re craving a sweet treat or a refreshing dessert, this mix is bound to satisfy your sweet tooth.

What Is Serendipity 3’s Canisters of Gourmet Frrrozen Hot Chocolate Mix?

If you’ve ever visited Serendipity 3 in NYC, you’ve likely tried its famous frozen hot chocolate. Rich, creamy, and totally delicious, it mimics the flavors of traditional hot cocoa but with a refreshing, chilled twist. The Gourmet Frrrozen Hot Chocolate Mix lets you bring that satisfying taste right into your home. Just blend the mix with milk and ice, and you’ve got a frosty treat that tastes just like the real thing.

Each canister has enough mix for about five to eight servings, depending on how rich you like it. Satisfy your sweet tooth for a week or more. And if you only want it for a special occasion, no worries! It’s shelf-stable for several years, so you can enjoy it whenever your craving strikes. Plus, if you prefer a warm version, the mix can be made hot, too! 

Serendipity 3’s Gourmet Frrrozen Hot Chocolate Mix is a perfect addition to your dessert lineup. Get creative by topping it with whipped cream, marshmallows, crushed cookies, or even adding a boozy twist. The best part? You can get 25% off your first food order at QVC with the code FOOD25.
